verses.name: 2 Chronicles 1:7
verses.text: In that night did God appear unto Solomon, and said unto him, Ask what I shall give thee.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 1:8
verses.text: And Solomon said unto God, Thou hast shewed great mercy unto David my father, and hast made me to reign in his stead.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 1:9
verses.text: Now, O Lord God, let thy promise unto David my father be established: for thou hast made me king over a people like the dust of the earth in multitude.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 1:10
verses.text: Give me now wisdom and knowledge, that I may go out and come in before this people: for who can judge this thy people, that is so great?
